markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ice Slick Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1471)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 40 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Using a [moderate frost vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77) as a catalyst, this snare spills out over the ground when triggered to create a slippery patch of ice on the ground. When a creature triggers this snare, it takes 2d6 cold damage and must attempt a DC 22 Reflex saving throw.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ice Slick Snare

text: <title level="1" right="Item 4" pfs="Limited" > Ice Slick Snare Source Pathfinder Special: Fumbus pg. 0 Price 40 gp --- Using a moderate frost vial as a catalyst, this snare spills out over the ground when triggered to create a slippery patch of ice on the ground. When a creature triggers this snare, it takes 2d6 cold damage and must attempt a DC 22 Reflex saving throw.
